017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
020
021import java.lang.reflect.GenericDeclaration;
022import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
023
024/**
025 * Bootstrap methods for invokedynamic situations.
026 *
027 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
028 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
029 */
030public final class Bootstraps {
031
032
033  /*
034   * Static fields.
035   */
036
037
038  /**
039   * The {@link ClassDesc} representing this class.
040   *
041   * @nullability This field is never {@code null}.
042   */
043  public static final ClassDesc CD_Bootstraps = Bootstraps.class.describeConstable().orElseThrow();
044
045
046  /*
047   * Constructors.
048   */
049
050
051  private Bootstraps() {
052    super();
053  }
054
055
056  /*
057   * Static methods.
058   */
059
060
061  /**
062   * Returns a {@link TypeVariable} with a {@linkplain
063   * TypeVariable#getName() name} {@linkplain String#equals(Object)
064   * equal to} the supplied {@code name} and that is declared by the
065   * supplied {@link GenericDeclaration}, or {@code null} if there is
066   * no such {@link TypeVariable}.
067   *
068   * @param gd the {@link GenericDeclaration} in question; may be
069   * {@code null} in which case {@code null} will be returned
070   *
071   * @param name the name in question; may be {@code null} in which
072   * case {@code null} will be returned
073   *
074   * @return a {@link TypeVariable} with a {@linkplain
075   * TypeVariable#getName() name} {@linkplain String#equals(Object)
076   * equal to} the supplied {@code name} and that is declared by the
077   * supplied {@link GenericDeclaration}, or {@code null}
078   *
079   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
080   *
081   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
082   *
083   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
084   * threads.
085   */
086  public static final TypeVariable<?> getTypeVariable(final GenericDeclaration gd, final String name) {
087    if (gd != null) {
088      for (final TypeVariable<?> typeVariable : gd.getTypeParameters()) {
089        if (typeVariable.getName().equals(name)) {
090          return typeVariable;
091        }
092      }
093    }
094    return null;
095  }
096
097}
